channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 広告インテリジェンスサービスMediaRadarがKantarの広告インテリジェンス部門であるVivvixを買収、MediaRadarは年間2,000億ドル以上の広告費を追跡、2万人の顧客を持つ（Kerry Flynn/Axios）
item.description:
Kerry Flynn / Axios:
Ad intelligence service MediaRadar acquires Vivvix, a Kantar ad intelligence unit; MediaRadar tracks $200B+ in annual ad spend and has 20K customers  —  Exit Content Preview  —  MediaRadar has acquired Vivvix, Kantar Group's North American advertising intelligence business, executives tell Axios.

item.title: エルサルバドル議会が、ジャーナリストを不当に標的にしたとの批判を受け、ギャングのメッセージの公表を犯罪とした法律を廃止、逮捕者は出なかった（Gerardo Arbaiza/Reuters）
item.description:
Gerardo Arbaiza / Reuters:
El Salvador's Congress repeals a law that criminalized the publication of gang messages, which critics said unjustly targeted journalists; no arrests were made  —  El Salvador's Congress repealed a law on Wednesday that criminalized the publication of gang messages, as ruling party leaders declared victory …

item.title: バングラデシュのダッカで最近行われた政治集会を取材していた国内外のジャーナリスト少なくとも27人がデモ隊や警察に襲撃された（ジャーナリスト保護委員会）
item.description:
Committee to Protect Journalists:
At least 27 local and international journalists covering recent political rallies in Bangladesh's Dhaka were attacked by demonstrators and the police  —  Bangladesh authorities must immediately and impartially investigate the assaults on at least 27 journalists covering recent political rallies …

item.title: ローカルニュースに5億ドルを投資するというPress Forwardの慈善活動へのコミットメント、彼のローカル・デジタル・ニュース・アウト「Lookout Santa Cruz」などについて、ケン・ドクターとのQ&A（Mark Caro/Local News Initiative）
item.description:
Mark Caro / Local News Initiative:
Q&A with Ken Doctor on the Press Forward's philanthropic commitment to invest $500M in local news, his local digital news outlet Lookout Santa Cruz, and more  —  Veteran journalist Ken Doctor had been analyzing “Newsonomics” for many years when he jumped back into the game to launch …

item.title: YouTube、7月の米国での値上げに続き、アルゼンチン、オーストラリア、オーストリア、ドイツ、ポーランド、トルコを含む全世界でPremiumの値上げを開始（Abner Li/9to5Google）
item.description:
Abner Li / 9to5Google:
YouTube begins raising Premium's price globally, including in Argentina, Australia, Austria, Germany, Poland, and Turkey, after raising the US price in July  —  Following the United States in July, YouTube Premium's international price increase is starting.

item.title: ドミトリー・ムラトフのドキュメンタリー『The Price of Truth』のパトリック・フォーブス監督に、ロシア最後の独立系新聞を存続させる試みについてQ&A（Eve Sampson/ICIJ）
item.description:
Eve Sampson / ICIJ:
Q&A with Patrick Forbes, the director of “The Price of Truth” documentary on Dmitry Muratov, on his attempts to keep Russia's last independent newspaper going  —  The film follows Nobel Prize-winning Russian journalist Dmitry Muratov as he tries to keep the country's last independent newspaper in operation.

item.title: EDPBはアイルランドのDPCに対し、2週間以内にEU加盟国およびEEA諸国全体でMetaによる行動ターゲティング広告への個人データ利用を禁止するよう指示した（Joe Duball/IAPP）
item.description:
Joe Duball / IAPP:
The EDPB instructs the Irish DPC to ban Meta's use of personal data for behavioral ads across the EU member states and EEA countries within two weeks  —  An unprecedented shakeup in the advertising technology space has arrived in Europe.  Changes are coming to adtech's approach to privacy …

item.title: The Economist』誌のポッドキャスト担当ディレクター、ジョン・プリドー氏へのインタビュー（最大の「The Intelligence」を除き、同誌のポッドキャストをすべて有料にすることについて）（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An interview with The Economist Director of Podcasts John Prideaux on putting all the outlet's podcasts behind its paywall, except its biggest, The Intelligence  —  The Economist's biggest podcast, The Intelligence, will be the only one remaining outside the paywall.

item.title: SEO業界を批判的に見る：ユーザーはGoogleがあまり役に立たなくなったと不満を漏らし、一部のSEO専門家はGoogleのアルゴリズムを利用するのは難しくなったと言っている、など（Amanda Chicago Lewis/The Verge）
item.description:
Amanda Chicago Lewis / The Verge:
A critical look at the SEO industry: users complain that Google isn't as useful anymore, some SEO experts say gaming Google's algorithm is now harder, and more  —  As the public begins to believe Google isn't as useful anymore, what happens to the cottage industry of search engine optimization experts …

item.title: セーラム・メディアがジャスト・ザ・ニュースと提携し、ジョン・ソロモン、ビクター・デイヴィス・ハンソン、バウアー＆ローズのポッドキャストをセーラム・ポッドキャスト・ネットワークに追加（セーラム・メディア・グループ社）
item.description:
Salem Media Group, Inc.:
Salem Media partners with Just The News to add podcasts by John Solomon, Victor Davis Hanson, and Bauer and Rose to the Salem Podcast Network  —  Salem Media Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: SALM) announced today a new partnership between the Salem Podcast Network and Just The News to place the podcasts of John Solomon …

item.title: シナノン教団を暴露し、1979年にピューリッツァー賞（公共サービス部門）を受賞した小さな新聞の元編集者兼共同発行人、デイヴィッド・ミッチェル氏が79歳で死去（サム・ロバーツ／ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙
item.description:
Sam Roberts / New York Times:
David Mitchell, former editor and co-publisher of a tiny newspaper that exposed the Synanon cult and won the 1979 Pulitzer Prize for Public Service, dies at 79  —  His tiny California newspaper won a Pulitzer Prize for its exposé of Synanon, a renowned drug rehabilitation program that had turned into a violent operation.

item.title: シンクレア、第3四半期の売上高は前年同期比9％減の7億6700万ドル、純損失は4600万ドル。
item.description:
TVNewsCheck:
Sinclair reports Q3 revenue down 9% YoY to $767M and a net loss of $46M, reflecting the deconsolidation of the sports segment that held regional sports networks  —  Sinclair Broadcast Group on Wednesday afternoon reported that its third quarter total revenue decreased 9% to $767 million versus $843 million in the prior year period.

item.title: CPJの世界不処罰指数：過去10年間に261人のジャーナリストが報復として殺害され、ハイチは不処罰国第3位に（Arlene Getz/Committee to Protect ...）
item.description:
Arlene Getz / Committee to Protect Journalists:
CPJ's Global Impunity Index: 261 journalists were murdered in retaliation for their work over the past decade; Haiti becomes the third-worst impunity offender  —  The persistent lack of justice for murdered reporters is a major threat to press freedom.  Ten years after the United Nations declared …

item.title: メモデイリービーストのヘザー・ディートリックCEOが2023年末に退社し、アウトサイド社のメディア最高責任者に就任、運営と150人以上のスタッフを統括する（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Memo: Daily Beast CEO Heather Dietrick is leaving to become chief media officer of Outside Inc., overseeing operations and 150+ staffers, at the end of 2023  —  Dietrick has been hired as chief media officer at Outside Interactive, whose 13 editorial brands include Outside Magazine, Backpacker …

item.title: ディズニーはNBCUが保有するHuluの33％の株式を取得し、完全な所有権を得る計画であり、275億ドルのフロア保証のNBCUのシェアに相当する86.1億ドルを支払う見込みである（The Walt Disney Company）。
item.description:
The Walt Disney Company:
Disney plans to acquire NBCU's 33% stake in Hulu, gaining full ownership, and expects to pay ~$8.61B, representing NBCU's share of a $27.5B guaranteed floor  —  The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) announced today that it will acquire the 33% stake in Hulu, LLC held by Comcast Corp.'s (NASDAQ …
